page.title: 172 Milk Street Bromley.
page.content: My name is Lee, I live with my mum dad, sister and pet rabbit at 2,Milk Street , Bromley, which is a council house built in 1962.I am 10 and I go to Burnt Ash Junior School.I enjoy cycling, playing cricket and football. My class looked at some old maps. Milk Street is very old, it is on the Rocque map of 1744. It led from Burnt Ash Lane to the Dairy farm,which is why it is called "Milk Street." Before 1962,the address"2,Milk Street" belonged to a farm cottage.At the library I found out who used to live there. In 1841 it was the Bridger family, and in 1861 Mr. and Mrs. Marshall and their nephew,a "garden boy", lived there. In the 1930's Mrs Rose ran a dairy from this address. I think my life is very different from those of the other children who have lived at 2, Milk Street.
